Trial_Design.evidence: Two hundred sixty such patients were randomized

Intervention.evidence: Ablation was randomized between pulmonary vein isolation and biatrial maze.

Objective.evidence: Objective:: To use novel statistical methods for analyzing the effect of lesion set on (long-standing) persistent atrial fibrillation (AF)

Method_Outcome.evidence: During 12 months postsurgery, 228 patients (88%) submitted 7949 transtelephonic monitoring (TTM) recordings, analyzed for AF, atrial flutter (AFL), or atrial tachycardia (AT).

Number_Randomised.evidence: Two hundred sixty such patients were randomized

Result_Outcome.evidence: Estimated freedom from AF/AFL/ATon any transmission trended higher after biatrial maze than pulmonary vein isolation (odds ratio, 2.31; 95% confidence interval, 0.95–5.65; P = .07)
